author: lightclient
content:
Hi all, we'll have a Portal implementers call this Friday at 1430 CET to discuss a proposal to move forward with the Portal project. The TLDR is that we will not support a standalone Portal client for the foreseeable future and instead focus on supporting the EL's needs for history storage and retrieval.

Meeting agenda is here, please post any specific topics you'd like to discuss beforehand: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1578
